features: Highly breathable, elasticated and wind-repellent schoeller® soft shell material for great comfort and maximum freedom of movement
Very robust soft shell material on the seat, knees and lower legs
Special wide waistband adjustment for a perfect fit-can be adjusted from outside
Leg width adjustable by snap buttons
Asymmetrically shaped hem for an optimal fit over mountaineering boots
Stowable attachment hook for secure fit over mountaineering boots
